SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NM , PRODUCT_PRICE, PLACE_CODE , PLACE_NM, PLACE_ADDR , TO_CHAR(CLASS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CLASS_DT , CLASS_TIME , CLASS_MAX_PPL FROM PRODUCT JOIN CLASS_DETAIL USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN CLASS_PLACE USING (PLACE_CODE) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
